colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,CES PA 'DI NI BLO GROS KYI 'JUG PA MCHOG TU YANGS PA'I DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG TSUL KHRIMS KYIS GRONG CHOG PA RNAMS KYI THUGS BZHED BSKONG BA'I SLAD DU BRI DGOS SU BSKUL BAR BRTEN NAS, ,SNYIGS DUS KYI MTHA' LA SLEBS PAS RGYAL PO'I GNOD PA BDO BA'I DUS 'DIR 'GA' ZHIG LA PHAN PA'ANG SRID DAM SNYAM PAS RGYAL PO'I MDO GZHUNG SOGS KHUNGS THUB PA RNAMS KYIS DON DANG MI 'GAL BAR BSGRIGS PA PO NI, @013B DHARMA SVA MI WA GINDRA PA tU SIDDHI'I MING CAN NO, , ('DIS KYANG 'GRO BA RNAMS NGA RGYAL DANG ZHE SDANG GI BSKUL BA'I GNOD BYED KYI 'CHAR SGO SNA TSOGS LAS THAR BAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: DHARMA SVA MI WA GINDRA PA tU SIDDHI'I MING CAN,
